athena:
TauSlice, H->tautau sample, pu46, run2 chains TauSlice, H->tautau sample, pu46, run2 chains EventMax=4000;runMergedChain=True TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_TauSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long
# include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_tau_sample2.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-tau-merge.root -b Test_bin.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau-merge.root data-tau_pu46_run2-reference.root HLT_tau25_idperf_track_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Tau_IDTrig HLT_tau25_idperf_tracktwo_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Tau_IDTrig_forID3 -d HLTEF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau-merge.root data-tau_pu46_run2-reference.root HLT_tau25_idperf_track_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Tau_FTF HLT_tau25_idperf_tracktwo_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_TauCore_FTF_forID1 HLT_tau25_idperf_tracktwo_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_TauIso_FTF_forID3 HLT_tau20_r1_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Tau_1 HLT_tau20_r1_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Tau_2 -d HLTL2-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau-merge.root data-tau_pu46_run2-reference.root HLT_tau29_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Tau_EFID HLT_tau20_r1_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Tau_EFID --tag EFID -d HLTEF-plots
